name: Watchwith
tag_list: metadata, entertainment, advertising, second-screen, ott, ebif, ios, android
overview:
Watchwith, the leader in related content syndication, unlocks value across the entertainment industry by transforming how people experience film and television. The Watchwith Platform™ gives content owners and app developers a way to realize new value by creating an engaging layer of time-based related content events around film, television programming and advertising. The Watchwith Platform also provides syndication of the related content experience to smartphones, tablets, connected TVs, game consoles, OTT set-top boxes, managed network set-top boxes and Blu-ray™ discs. Powered by the Related Content Database™, Watchwith enables content owners to create new licensable related content properties that will generate profits across media far into the future. Motorola Mobility, Inc., and Sony Network Entertainment are strategic investors in the company. Watchwith is headquartered in San Francisco, California. For more information visit watchwith.com.

The Related Content Database™ was originally established in 2006 to provide content owners with a database in the cloud that enables them to add a related content experiences to their Blu-ray™ discs. Our proven software solutions and data services have been deployed by major films studios and consumer brands including The Walt Disney Company, 20th Century Fox, Sony Pictures Entertainment, Warner Bros, Netflix, Fandango and Totalmovie. The Related Content Database contains second-by-second time-based metadata for over 3000 feature film and television programs. Today, the tools we’ve used internally to create this catalog of licensable time-based metadata have evolved into the Watchwith Platform and the Related Content Database remains a core component of the platform.

For more information visit watchwith.com.

milestones.source_description: RCDB REBRANDS AS WATCHWITH, LAUNCHES WATCHWITH PLATFORM-AS-A-SERVICE, OPENS BETA DEVELOPER PROGRAM
